name: plain
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: plain
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: not decorated in any way; with nothing added
trans_examp.trans_cn: 朴素的；不加修饰的；简单的

example.eg: She wore a plain black dress.
example.egtrans: 她穿着一件朴素的黑色连衣裙。

example.eg: We've chosen a plain carpet (= one without a pattern) and patterned curtains.
example.egtrans: 我们挑了一块没有图案的地毯和带图案的窗帘。

example.eg: He prefers plain food - nothing too fancy.
example.egtrans: 他喜欢清淡简单的食物——不喜欢太讲究的。

example.eg: We're having plain blue walls in the dining room.
example.egtrans: 我们客厅里的墙壁要纯蓝色的。

example.eg: a catalogue sent in a plain brown envelope
example.egtrans: 用纯褐色信封寄出的目录

example.eg: plain yogurt (= with no added fruit or sugar)

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: paper that has no lines on it

example.eg: a letter written on plain paper

dsense.name: plain
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

example.eg: It's quite plain that they don't want to speak to us.
example.egtrans: 很明显，他们不想和我们说话。

example.eg: I made it quite plain (that) (= explained clearly that) I wasn't interested.
example.egtrans: 我明白地表示我不感兴趣。

dsense.name: plain
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

example.eg: It was plain stupidity on Richard's part.

dsense.name: plain
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: (especially of a woman or girl) not beautiful
trans_examp.trans_cn: （尤指女性）相貌平平的，不好看的

example.eg: She had been a very plain child.
example.egtrans: 她小时候并不是个漂亮的孩子。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: a woman or girl who is not attractive
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 平凡的珍妮（不漂亮的女人或女孩）

example.eg: If she'd been a plain Jane, she wouldn't have had all the attention.
example.egtrans: 如果她象平凡的珍妮，她就不会成为关注的焦点。

name: plain
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: plain
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a large area of flat land

example.eg: High mountains rise above the plain.

dsense.name: plain
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a type of simple stitch in knitting

example.eg: a row of plain and two rows of purl

name: plain
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

example.eg: I mean, taking the wrong equipment with you - that's just plain stupid.
example.egtrans: 我的意思是，你拿错仪器简直是愚蠢透顶。
